entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
